name: SteamFall - Demo
description:
Step into the world of steampunk and fend off hordes of mechanical monsters in this thrilling survival game. Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted steampunk environment as you battle your way through waves of enemies. This demo showcases a wealth of features, including the mystery box, buyable perks, and much more, reminiscent of popular games like Call of Duty Zombies. Keep in mind that this is still a work in progress and your feedback is crucial to its development. Help shape the future of this exciting game and enjoy the steampunk survival experience to the fullest! 

I have been working on a comic book series for some time and I am now excited to announce its transformation into a video game. With the goal of expanding the series into a full-fledged story mode, I am eager to see if there is enough interest to bring my vision to life. Join me on this journey as I bring the pages of my comic book to life.

After being dormant for an extended period, I successfully revitalized the project from my portable hard drive. I have a comprehensive list of features to incorporate. Also, this project is fully compatible and works just fine on Steam and LAN networking to enjoy with your friends!

NOTE: The game had a change of name due to licensing going forward it will be called SteamFall
